item.title: Stocks to buy for short term: Ajit Mishra of Religare Broking recommends THESE 3 shares for 1-2 weeks

review.headline_rewrite: Stocks to buy for short term: Ajit Mishra of Religare Broking recommends THESE 3 shares for 1-2 weeks
bullets: However, concerns over Trump's tariffs and foreign capital outflow continue weighing on sentiment, triggering profit booking after a market rally.
The subsequent breakout above the ₹72 resistance has opened the door for further upside, with the potential to revisit its previous swing high.

item.title: Shares to buy or sell: Chandan Taparia recommends three stocks to buy and sell today - 5 September 2025

review.headline_rewrite: Shares to buy or sell: Chandan Taparia recommends three stocks to buy and sell today - 5 September 2025
bullets: The trends on the Gift Nifty also signal a higher opening for the benchmark indices, Nifty 50 and Sensex.
The Sensex advanced 150.30 points, or 0.19%, to close at 80,718.01, while the Nifty 50 settled 19.25 points, or 0.08%, higher at 24,734.30.
He recommends buying KEI Industries shares for a target price of ₹4,425 apiece, while maintaining a stop loss at ₹3,970 level.
Taparia has a ‘Buy’ call on Apollo Hospitals shares with a target price of ₹8,335, and a stop loss at ₹7,685 level.

item.title: Lenders of bankrupt Jaiprakash Associates to meet Friday; challenge process among 5 bidders likely

review.headline_rewrite: Lenders of bankrupt Jaiprakash Associates to meet Friday; challenge process among 5 bidders likely
bullets: JAL was admitted into the corporate insolvency resolution process (CIRP) through the National Company Law Tribunal, Allahabad Bench, order dated June 3, 2024.
